sentences.sContent: Conrad Anker, Brady Robinson and Jimmy Chin were confined to their undersize two - person portal edge several thousand feet up on the face.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conrad Anker, Brady Robinson and Jimmy Chin were confined to their undersize two - person portal edge several thousand feet up on the face.
sentences.sCn: 康拉德•安科尔，布雷迪•罗宾逊和麦展只限于他们的尺寸不足二人入口边缘的数千英尺起来就面对。

trans.tranCn: 不够大的；小于一般尺寸的
